targets.expr:
avg_over_time(
    min(
(sum_over_time(((
  (
    (sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app_ids", status!~"5.."}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name))
    /
    (sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name))
  ) > bool 0.995)
  +
  (sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name) == bool 0)
)[$availability_span:])
/
count_over_time(sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name)[$availability_span:])
)
    )
[$availability_span:])

avg(
sum_over_time((histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(service_request_seconds_bucket{kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", kubernetes_name=~"$service", method!="OPTION", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m]) )  by (le,kubernetes_name))  <= bool 0.5) [$availability_span:] )            
/
sum_over_time((sum(rate(service_request_seconds_count{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace",  method!="OPTION", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name) > bool 0) [$availability_span:])
)

avg(
sum_over_time((histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(service_request_seconds_bucket{kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", kubernetes_name=~"$service", method!="OPTION", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m]) )  by (le,kubernetes_name))  <= bool 0.25) [$availability_span:] )            
/
sum_over_time((sum(rate(service_request_seconds_count{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace",  method!="OPTION", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name) > bool 0) [$availability_span:])
)

targets.query: app.environment: "$namespace" AND app.service.name: "$elasticsearch" AND app.loglevel: "error"  AND app.loglevel: "ERROR"

panels.title: Nginx SLO over $availability_span  (all service calls from UI)

targets.expr:
(sum_over_time(((
  (
    (sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app_ids", status!~"5.."}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name))
    /
    (sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name))
  ) > bool 0.995)
  +
  (sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name) == bool 0)
)[$availability_span:])
/
count_over_time(sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name)[$availability_span:])
)

(sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", app=~"$app_ids", status!~"5.."}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name) )
/
(sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name) )

targets.query: app.environment: "$namespace" AND app.service.name: "$elasticsearch" AND app.loglevel: "error"  AND app.loglevel: "ERROR"

/
sum_over_time((sum(rate(service_request_seconds_count{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace",  method!="OPTION", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name) > bool 0) [$availability_span:])

sum_over_time((histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(service_request_seconds_bucket{kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", kubernetes_name=~"$service", method!="OPTION", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m]) )  by (le,kubernetes_name))  <= bool 0.25) [$availability_span:] )

sum_over_time((sum(rate(service_request_seconds_count{kubernetes_name=~"$service", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace",  method!="OPTION", app=~"$app_ids"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name) > bool 0) [$availability_span:])
